Scranton.PNC Field: PNC Field, formerly Lackawanna County Stadium (1989–2006), is a 10,000-seat minor league baseball stadium located in Moosic, Pennsylvania that serves the Scranton-Wilkes-Barre Metropolitan Area. It is the home of the Scranton/Wilkes-Barre RailRiders, the Triple-A affiliate of the New York Yankees. It also hosts the PIAA District II baseball district championship games.
